text: What is the real use of the professional associations? For example, in my area there is AGU (American Geophysical Union), AMS (American meteorological society) and UGM (Mexican geophysical union), among others. I am affiliated to two of them because being a member is a requirement to participate in the anual meetings (which also require a payment for abstact submission and for attending, which I think is reasonable). Apart from giving you access to the conferences or meetings, do I get any benefit from being a member of such kind of organizations? I think the situation is similar to all the areas of academia
